docs.lead_paragraph: After David Price consulted two renowned orthopedic doctors, the Boston Red Sox said Friday the left-hander will not need surgery or an injection in his ailing left arm.

headline.print_headline: Red Sox Say Price Will Not Need Arm Surgery or Injection
headline.main: Red Sox Say Price Will Not Need Arm Surgery or Injection

docs.snippet: After David Price consulted two renowned orthopedic doctors, the Boston Red Sox said Friday the left-hander will not need surgery or an injection in his ailing left arm....

docs.lead_paragraph: A Maine ski resort employee has lost his footing and been killed in a tumble down a steep mogul course that was being prepared for competition.

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal complaint unsealed on Friday in Federal District Court in Manhattan charged Juan Thompson, a former reporter, with making more than a half-dozen bomb threats against Jewish community centers, schools and a museum, partly in an effort to intimidate a former girlfriend.

docs.lead_paragraph: For more than two weeks, a stench of feces, ammonium and laundry detergent wafted through the air in the southwestern corner of the continental United States. Residents who contacted government offices got no answers.

docs.lead_paragraph: More shrubs moving onto Arctic tundra because of climate change will have minimal effect on many of the bird species that breed there, but birds likely will seek other habitat when the shrubs grow tall, according to a new federal study.

headline.print_headline: Warming, Taller Shrubs May Affect Birds Breeding on Tundra
headline.main: Warming, Taller Shrubs May Affect Birds Breeding on Tundra
